name: Elite Pierogi Hunt
description:
Description

Endless runner made for Your Culture Game Jam, so... traditional polish dress, p i e r o g i as powerups, hearts in shape of Poland. As there was additional topic of the game "Death is no the end", so in this game it's literally this - you don't die after death (at least not the first time).

Controls and rules

Every 4th powerup collected you gain one heart (up to 7 hearts). If you are "dead", collecting 3 broken hearts and 4 pierogi will resurrect you.

Additional information

Every assets in this game is made by me. You can see from art that I changed my art style mid project and had no time for changes. Only thing that I haven't done is sound effects and music. I tried (movement sound is made by me), but it's more difficult than I thought and it took me more time than I wished. This is my first game that I took more time polishing than usual and I am very pleased how it turned out. As always there is many things that I whished I could do if I had more time (like art for dead player), but still it's good enough.
